body_html: It's a planned incompatible change in Bazel. set is deprecated and was removed by default from Bazel starting with 0.6. You can use the flag from the error message to temporarily use set in .bzl files, but the flag will be removed at some point too (probably at Bazel 0.8), so it's recommended to fix the .bzl files.

You can use the flag from the error message to temporarily use set in .bzl files, but the flag will be removed at some point too (probably at Bazel 0.8), so it's recommended to fix the .bzl files.
body: It's a planned incompatible change in Bazel. `set` is deprecated and was removed by default from Bazel starting with 0.6. You can use the flag from the error message to temporarily use `set` in .bzl files, but the flag will be removed at some point too (probably at Bazel 0.8), so it's recommended to fix the .bzl files.
